blogPost.excerpt: Customers are demanding control over their personal data. Give it to them with ease. ✔ Onboard your app or website in minutes ✔ Securely send data with easy to use APIs and SDKs ✔ Give your end-users complete control with the plug-n-play Personal Data Center.
blogPost.body: Customers are demanding control over their personal data. Give it to them with ease. ✔ Onboard your app or website in minutes ✔ Securely send data with easy to use APIs and SDKs ✔ Give your end-users complete control with the plug-n-play Personal Data Center.
blogPost.title: Rownd Data Privacy Platform - Give your users control over their personal data
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 客户要求对其个人数据进行控制。轻松地为他们提供数据。✔ 在数分钟内完成您的应用程序或网站的安装 ✔ 利用易于使用的 API 和 SDK 安全发送数据 ✔ 利用即插即用的个人数据中心，让您的最终用户完全控制数据。
localize.tagline: 让您的用户控制他们的个人数据

localize.description: 客戶要求對其個人數據進行控制。輕鬆地爲他們提供數據。✔ 在數分鐘內完成您的應用程序或網站的安裝 ✔ 利用易於使用的 API 和 SDK 安全發送數據 ✔ 利用即插即用的個人數據中心，讓您的最終用戶完全控制數據。
localize.tagline: 讓您的用戶控制他們的個人數據

previous.excerpt: Rollups lets you replace the constant stream of emails flooding your inbox by bundling all of your mailing lists into one digest email, sent weekly.
previous.title: Rollups by Leave Me Alone - Combine newsletters into weekly digest emails 💌

localize.description: 通过将所有的邮件列表捆绑成一个摘要邮件，每周发送一次，卷积可以让您取代不断涌入您的收件箱的邮件流。
localize.tagline: 将新闻通讯合并到每周的摘要邮件中💌。

localize.description: 通過將所有的郵件列表捆綁成一個摘要郵件，每週發送一次，卷積可以讓您取代不斷湧入您的收件箱的郵件流。
localize.tagline: 將新聞通訊合併到每週的摘要郵件中💌。

next.excerpt: Stop wasting time and start creating the kind of content your learners deserve with Docebo Shape. Shape’s an AI-based content creation tool that lets you build beautiful and engaging xAPI content you can share with learners in just minutes.
next.title: Shape - Get AI-based learning content in minutes

localize.description: 停止浪费时间，开始使用Docebo Shape创建您的学习者值得拥有的内容。Shape是一款基于人工智能的内容创建工具，它能让您在几分钟内创建出精美且引人入胜的xAPI内容，并与学习者分享。
localize.tagline: 分分钟获取基于AI的学习内容

localize.description: 停止浪費時間，開始使用Docebo Shape創建您的學習者值得擁有的內容。Shape是一款基於人工智能的內容創建工具，它能讓您在幾分鐘內創建出精美且引人入勝的xAPI內容，並與學習者分享。
